meanings.sent1: She toughed out the long hike through the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The team toughed through the challenging project deadline.
meanings.sent3: Despite the rain, he toughed it out and finished the race.
meanings.sent4: She toughed the storm of criticism with grace.
meanings.sent5: The soldier toughed the harsh training to become stronger.

meanings.sent1: The toughed fabric of the bag lasted for years.
meanings.sent2: His toughed attitude helped him overcome obstacles.
meanings.sent3: The toughed toy survived the playful puppy's bites.
meanings.sent4: Her toughed determination shone through in every challenge.
meanings.sent5: The toughed tree stood tall against the strong winds.

meanings.sent1: The toughed edges of the box scratched the table.
meanings.sent2: The toughed treatment of the book left it damaged.
meanings.sent3: The toughed handling of the situation only made it worse.
meanings.sent4: His toughed approach to negotiations caused tension.
meanings.sent5: The toughed surface of the road made driving difficult.
